daisy

geom_daisy.Rd

geom_daisy creates a ggplot daisy.

Usage

geom_daisy(x = 1, y = 1, petal = "pink", center = "yellow", scale = 1)

Arguments

x

= 1 x position

y

= 1 y position

petal

petal colour

center

center colour

scale

scale of daisy

Value

ggplot daisy

Examples


library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)

ggplot() +
 geom_daisy() +
 coord_fixed() +
 theme_void()
